short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Allows you to easily look up words on webpages in Merriam-Webster's dictionary. Highlight a word and click the book icon to begin.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Highlight a word on a website, and a book icon will pop up next to it. Click that to search the word on Merriam Webster. Alternatively, use the icon on the browser dock to manually search.
